resources.string:
• Programming Languages: 
Java, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, iOS Swift, Kotlin, C++, SQL
 
• Professional Skills: 
Git/GitHub, Unix, Maven, Gradle, MongoDB, MySQL, JMeter, JUnit, JSON, Tomcat, jQuery, Bootstrap, D3.js, Google Map API, Amazon EC2, R, Tableau
 
• Courses: 
Data Structures and Algorithms, Algorithms and Computational Complexity, Database Systems, Web Development, Android Development, iOS Mobile Development, Machine Learning, Data Science

• University of Washington, Seattle, WA 
M.S. in Management Information Systems, Information School 
Specialization in Software Development, GPA: 3.89/4.0
 
• Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shanghai 
B.S. M.S. in Bioinformatics and Pharmaceutical Science, GPA: 3.95/4.0, Rank: 1/76

Software Engineer (Full-time Internship)
Agilysys, Inc., Bellevue, WA 
• Worked on Agilysys Buy team in Java backend development with Spring framework for a point-of-sale kiosk used in 1/3 of corporate cafeteria nationwide 
• Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for the partnership with Microsoft to allow customers to search stores, get items and update payment, etc. 
• Built MongoDB template to capture the item data with the Spring MongoDB 
• Wrote unit tests (Mockito and TestNG) and test suites, tested HTTP requests and responses by JMeter
 
Associate Specialist in Digital Solution
Medtronic Inc., Shanghai 
• Analyzed over 2,000 Parkinson patients’ data using Python, used Tableau to create multi-metrics dashboards, driving business decisions on patients’ media preferences 
• Built new features within Medtronic’s official website and WeChat platforms resulting in 233% increase in the number of users, managed the development and testing of patient stories/videos’ web apps

Android App for Easy Carpooling
 • Designed and developed an Android App for students to easily find a carpool ride, the rider and driver can be connected via the app to carpool to the same class/campus event
 • Integrated Google Map API to display the nearby users and navigate to the destination
 • Implemented features such as login/logout module, call/cancel a carpool, nearby riders within a distance, user data management with Amazon EC2 to handle queries, etc.
 
Twitter Clone
 • Analyzed the requirement of Twitter and developed an interactive web application based on MVC for users to post, view, and search tweets using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
 • Designed Twitter architecture with features including account registration, session, publishing character- number-restricted tweets, viewing tweets with descending time order, follow/unfollow other users and searching tweets with PHP, AJAX, MySQL, EcoWeb Hosting, FileFTP
 • Used Bootstrap and D3 to build frontend pages for better visualization
 
NFL Game Prediction
 • Trained a model of NFL team offensive and defensive quality to best matches the data from a collection of NFL games using Java, implemented the coordinate descent algorithm to calculate the model parameters
 • Tuned the parameters of the training model to avoid overfitting and minimize the errors
 • Applied the trained model to simulate and predict the winning percentage of future NFL games
 • Wrote Unit Test with Junit
 
Tic-Tac-Toe App with AI
 • Designed and implemented an Android App for the users to play Tic-Tac-Toe game with computer AI
 • Implemented the computer AI using a minimax tree-search algorithm and optimized searching with simple pruning and alpha-beta pruning techniques
